VRPoseOrientation.summary: IMPORTANT Deprecated The orientation read-only property of the interface returns the orientation of the sensor at the current timestamp, as a quarternion value.

blockquote.para: Note: This property was part of the old WebVR API. It has been superseded by the WebXR Device API.

remarks.para: The value is a , made up of the following values:
The orientation yaw (rotation around the y axis) is relative to the initial yaw of the sensor when it was first read or the yaw of the sensor at the point that was last called.

VRPoseOrientation.value: A , or null if the VR sensor is not able to provide orientation data.
